title: Poha
steps: Soak the poha and drain excess water.
Heat oil, add mustard seeds and let them splutter.
Add onions, peas, turmeric, saut√© well.
Mix in the soaked poha and cook for 3-5 minutes.

title: Tomato Pasta
steps: Boil pasta until al dente.
Prepare sauce with olive oil, garlic, onion, and tomato.
Mix pasta with sauce and simmer for 2 minutes.

title: Grilled Paneer Salad
steps: Grill paneer cubes until golden.
Toss veggies with olive oil and lemon juice.
Top with grilled paneer and serve.

title: Banana Oat Smoothie
steps: Blend all ingredients until smooth.
Serve chilled.

title: Stuffed Paratha
steps: Make dough from wheat flour.
Prepare stuffing with mashed potato and spices.
Roll parathas, stuff, and cook on pan until golden brown.

title: Chickpea Salad
steps: Boil chickpeas if not canned.
Mix with chopped vegetables and mint.
Add lemon juice and salt to taste.

title: Spinach Dal
steps: Boil dal with spinach until soft.
Prepare tempering with mustard seeds, garlic, onion, tomato.
Mix tempering into dal and simmer for 5 minutes.

title: Masala Omelette
steps: Whisk eggs with spices and chopped veggies.
Cook on medium heat until firm.

title: Rice & Mixed Veg Curry
steps: Boil rice.
Prepare curry with vegetables and spices.
Serve curry over rice.

title: Fruit Yogurt Bowl
steps: Chop fruits and add to yogurt.
Top with granola and drizzle with honey.
